entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
